issue.title: [Python] PythonFile should infer mode when not given
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2218](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2218). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The following is clearly not optimal:

```python

>>> f = open('README.md', 'r')
>>> pa.PythonFile(f).mode
'wb'
```
